long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QR Code Generator | Reader is a convenient and multifunctional Chrome extension that allows users to quickly and easily generate and scan QR codes. This extension is perfect for creating QR codes on the fly and instantly reading QR codes directly in the browser.

Key Features

QR Code Generation:

 - Create QR codes from text, URLs, phone numbers, email addresses, and other types of data.
 - Easily adjust the size and error correction level of QR codes.
 - Save generated QR codes as image files (PNG) for future use.

QR Code Scanning:

 - Quickly scan QR codes using your device's camera or from images on your computer.
 - Automatically detect and decode QR codes from any webpage.
 - Easily copy the decoded information to your clipboard for quick access.

User-Friendly Interface:

 - Simple and intuitive interface for both generating and scanning QR codes.
 - One-click access to QR code generation and scanning features from the Chrome toolbar.
 - Responsive design that works seamlessly across different devices and screen sizes.

Customization Options:

 - Customize the appearance of generated QR codes with different colors and styles.
 - Adjust the margin size and background color of the QR codes.
 - Options to include logos or images within the QR codes for branding purposes.

Security and Privacy:

 - Securely generate and scan QR codes without sharing your data with third parties.
 - Offline functionality for generating QR codes without an internet connection.

How to Use

Generate QR Codes:

 - Click on the QR Code Generator | Reader icon in the Chrome toolbar.
Enter the data you want to encode (e.g., URL, text).
 - Customize the QR code's appearance and size if needed.
 - Click "Generate" and save the QR code image or copy it to the clipboard.

Install QR Code Generator | Reader today and enhance your browsing experience with the power of QR codes!
